install.name: RokAjaxSearch
install.author: Djamil Legato
install.description: RokAjaxSearch is an ajaxian searcher that displays the results immediately and allows to choose the proper one.

param.name: search_page
param.label: Search page URL.
param.description:
Relative path to your search page.
Example: index.php?option=com_search

param.name: adv_search_page
param.label: Advanced Search page URL.
param.description:
Relative path to your advanced search page.
Example: index.php?option=com_search&view=search

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Advanced search
param.description: This part is for you to change to your needs. These will be the default search alternatives passed to com_search. Same options as on the com_search page.

param.name: websearch
param.label: Enable Google Web Search
param.description: Enabling this will allow you to use Google API Search for searching the web via RokAjaxSearch. Note that the API Key is needed

param.name: websearch_api
param.label: Google Ajax Search API Key
param.description: In order to use RokAjaxSearch Web Search, you need a Google Ajax Search API Key. You can generate one for free at: http://code.google.com/apis/ajaxsearch/signup.html

param.name: show_pagination
param.label: Show Pagination
param.description: Set this option to yes, if you want to show the pagination on google's results.

param.name: show_estimated
param.label: Show Estimated
param.description: Set this option to yes, if you want to show the estimated google results count.

param.name: hide_divs
param.label: Hide div id(s)
param.description: If you want to hide one or more div tags on your page, input div ids here, seperate with space.

param.name: include_link
param.label: Link to all results
param.description: Set this option to yes, if you want a text to appear at the bottom of the result list that links to com_search page.

param.name: show_description
param.label: Show Description
param.description: Set this option to yes, if you want to show the description on each result item.

param.name: include_category
param.label: Include (Category/Section)
param.description: Set this option to yes, if you want category and section to show up under each title.

param.name: show_readmore
param.label: Show Read More link
param.description: Set this option to yes, if you want the read more link to show up under the description.
